item.title: [PI] Exchange 2000m for a 2Bill Coin [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:36, topic:450179”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=553079.msg4136891#msg4136891 date=1351793029]

Really bro?

[quote] public void initialize() {
mymessage();

}[/quote]

[quote] public void mymessage() {
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
public void execute(EventContainer c) {
int r3 = 0;
r3 = Misc.random(5);
if (r3 == 0) {
sendMessage(“Devenb123”);
saveCharacter = true;
} else if (r3 == 1) {
sendMessage(“If you have nothing nice to say”);
saveCharacter = true;
} else if (r3 == 2) {
sendMessage(“Dont say shit”);
saveCharacter = true;
} else if (r3 == 3) {
sendMessage(“bite your tounge and go bleed”);
saveCharacter = true;
} else if (r3 == 4) {
sendMessage(" ");
saveCharacter = true;
}
}
}, 300000); //milisecondsservermessage
};[/quote]
[/quote]Someone doesn’t know how to use switch statements. This is a shit way of doing it, and I’ve released this idea in my server before. Nothing new.

doesnt matter.

btw why a switch? thats retarded use an array.

public void mymessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { String[] messages = new String[] { "Devenb123", "If you have nothing nice to say", "dont say shit", "bite your tounge and go bleed", " " }; for (String message : messages) { sendMessage(message); saveCharacter = true; } } }, 300000); //milisecondsservermessage }[/quote]

<3

@bump Why would you bump this shit topic just to bitch about how shitty it is?

@alltimenewb wrote:

I’m sorry if this is grave digging but wouldn’t it be easier to add the item to a shop, then go to prices.cfg and change it to 1b. Atleast thats what I did. I used gem bag and coal bad for the items, coal bag is 500m gp and gem bag is 1b. I just think it would save so much time doing it this way.

item.title: [PI] Exchange 2000m for a 2Bill Coin [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“RS PS, post:18, topic:450179”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=553079.msg4054407#msg4054407 date=1342810222]
If you’re actually going to be doing this, you should just create your own custom Token.
[/quote]
You mean your own custom model? I just renamed Dragon_Token to Billion

ActionHandler: Under First Click NPC

case 290: c.getDH().sendDialogues(36899, npcType); break;

DialogueHandler:

case 36899: sendOption2("1B To Token", "Token To 1B"); c.dialogueAction = 36899; break;

ClickingButtons:

Under Case 9157:

[code=java]if (c.dialogueAction == 36899) {
c.getPA().Change();

}[/code]

Under Case 9158:

[code=java]if (c.dialogueAction == 36899) {
c.getPA().Change2();

}[/code]

PlayerAssistant:

[code=java]public void Change() {

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 1000000000)) {
c.sendMessage(“You exchange your 1B GP for a 1B Token”);
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
c.getItems().deleteItem(995,c.getItems().getItemSlot(995),1000000000);
c.getItems().addItem(7478, 1);

} else

                                    if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000000)) {

c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
}
}

public void Change2() {

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(7478, 1)) {
c.sendMessage(“You exchange your 1B Token for 1B GP.”);
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
c.getItems().deleteItem(7478,c.getItems().getItemSlot(7478),1);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 1000000000);
}
}[/code]

Much Simpler with just two options and with exchanging of both…[/quote]

I mean your own Custom Token, I don’t know how I can simplify that, lol. Did you “rename” your Token via hard-code?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Exchange 2000m for a 2Bill Coin [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Team_Rocket:

If you’re actually going to be doing this, you should just create your own custom Token.

You mean your own custom model? I just renamed Dragon_Token to Billion

ActionHandler: Under First Click NPC

case 290: c.getDH().sendDialogues(36899, npcType); break;

DialogueHandler:

case 36899: sendOption2("1B To Token", "Token To 1B"); c.dialogueAction = 36899; break;

ClickingButtons:

Under Case 9157:

[code=java]if (c.dialogueAction == 36899) {
c.getPA().Change();

}[/code]

Under Case 9158:

[code=java]if (c.dialogueAction == 36899) {
c.getPA().Change2();

}[/code]

PlayerAssistant:

[code=java]public void Change() {

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 1000000000)) {
c.sendMessage(“You exchange your 1B GP for a 1B Token”);
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
c.getItems().deleteItem(995,c.getItems().getItemSlot(995),1000000000);
c.getItems().addItem(7478, 1);

} else

                                    if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000000)) {

c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
}
}

public void Change2() {

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(7478, 1)) {
c.sendMessage(“You exchange your 1B Token for 1B GP.”);
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
c.getItems().deleteItem(7478,c.getItems().getItemSlot(7478),1);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 1000000000);
}
}[/code]

Much Simpler with just two options and with exchanging of both…

Read full topic
